Entry.JapaneseText: 本当にどうかしてるわ…… こんな砂漠に人を放り出すなんて……！
Entry.EnglishText: How could they do something like that... How could they just throw people out into the desert?

Entry.JapaneseText: うん！ アニカマルに戻って ガツンと叱っちゃうもんネ！
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah, let's go back to Anikamal and give them a piece of our minds!
